title: So create one Button on xml file like below.

inline_content.Text: So create one Button on xml file like below.

title:
<Button
       android:id="@+id/dialog_bt_date"
       android:layout_below="@+id/resetButton"
       android:layout_width="wrap_content"
       android:layout_height="40dp"
       android:textColor="#FF000000"
       android:gravity="center"
       android:text="DATE"/>

content_resolved.code:
<Button
       android:id="@+id/dialog_bt_date"
       android:layout_below="@+id/resetButton"
       android:layout_width="wrap_content"
       android:layout_height="40dp"

       android:gravity="center"
       android:text="DATE"/>
